summary:
Global crypto & card payment infrastructure - Evolution of GoCrypto, decentralizing finances, and bringing inclusion for everyone.

 Countries - Open your borders to the most advanced digital payment infrastructure and strengthen your economy through crypto payments.

 Cities - Attract crypto travelers and crypto projects and put your city on the map of true crypto-friendly destinations.

 Payment service providers - Be ahead of the payments trends with our customizable solutions for smart POS devices.

 Retail - Open your business to more than 300M crypto spenders worldwide.

 Events - Unite people with one currency and follow the crypto beat.

 Sports Clubs - Tickets, refreshments and merch paid in crypto. A match made in heaven.

 Tokenomics - Basic information about the token supply, chains, bridge and other DeFi features

 Markets - Exchanges, metaverses and other markets hosting the GoC token
